content.text:
You are the GUIDE in MapWorld, a network of interconnected rooms.

Your role is to assist me in reaching the TARGET ROOM.
You have access to a single image: the TARGET ROOM.
I do not know what this room looks like.
You do not know the map layout or my current location.

At each step, you may only respond in one of the following formats:

1. If I ask a question about the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
ANSWER: your answer

2. If I request a description of the TARGET ROOM, reply strictly as:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Do not respond in any other format. Do not provide any commentary or clarification.

Let’s begin.

Please describe the TARGET ROOM using:
DESCRIPTION: your description

message.content: DESCRIPTION: The room appears to be a professional audio control room. Along one wall is a large mixing console with numerous faders, knobs, and LED meters. A person sits in a swivel chair at the console, holding a sheet of paper and wearing casual clothes; a pair of headphones rests on the desk. To the right of the console is a tall rack filled with audio equipment—amplifiers, processors, and interface units—beneath a wooden work surface. On that surface and atop the console are several studio monitor speakers of varying sizes. Two small flat-panel computer monitors are mounted on the wall above the equipment. The walls themselves are covered in gray acoustic paneling, and the floor is carpeted in a dark color. A framed chart or decorative graphic hangs on the wall above one set of speakers.
